actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $6,000 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from their social security benefits on account of excess earnings.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase to $6,000 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from their social security benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $6,000 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from their social security benefits on account of excess earnings.
